reg_info.full_title: R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 953: GUIDES IN QUETICO PROVINCIAL PARK
reg_info.act_under: Provincial Parks Act   Loi sur les parcs provinciaux

content.content: 1. In this Regulation, “non-resident” means a person who is not a resident; “resident” means a person who has actually resided in Ontario for a period of at least seven months during the twelve months immediately preceding the time that his or her residence becomes material under this Regulation. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 953, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. In this Regulation,

“non-resident” means a person who is not a resident;

“resident” means a person who has actually resided in Ontario for a period of at least seven months during the twelve months immediately preceding the time that his or her residence becomes material under this Regulation. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 953, s. 1.

content.content: 2. No person shall act as a guide in Quetico Provincial Park unless he or she is the holder of a licence in Form 1 or Form 2. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 953, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. No person shall act as a guide in Quetico Provincial Park unless he or she is the holder of a licence in Form 1 or Form 2. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 953, s. 2.

content.content: 3. (1) A licence issued to a resident to act as a guide in Quetico Provincial Park shall be in Form 1 and the fee therefor is $2. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 953, s. 3 (1). (2) A licence issued to a non-resident to act as a guide in Quetico Provincial Park shall be in Form 2 and the fee therefor is $25. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 953, s. 3 (2). (3) An application for a licence in Form 1 or Form 2 shall be in Form 3. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 953, s. 3 (3). (4) A licence in Form 1 or Form 2 expires with the 31st day of March next following the date on which it is issued. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 953, s. 3 (4). FORM 1 Provincial Parks Act   R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 953, Form 1. FORM 2 Provincial Parks Act  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 953, Form 2. FORM 3 Provincial Parks Act  R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 953, Form 3.
content.raw_html:
3. (1) A licence issued to a resident to act as a guide in Quetico Provincial Park shall be in Form 1 and the fee therefor is $2. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 953, s. 3 (1).

(2) A licence issued to a non-resident to act as a guide in Quetico Provincial Park shall be in Form 2 and the fee therefor is $25. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 953, s. 3 (2).

(3) An application for a licence in Form 1 or Form 2 shall be in Form 3. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 953, s. 3 (3).

(4) A licence in Form 1 or Form 2 expires with the 31st day of March next following the date on which it is issued. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 953, s. 3 (4).
